title: KIA corporate font
content:
hey there,

does anyone of you know which typeface KIA, the car company, uses as their corporate font? (in germany -\> [www.kia.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316060120/http:/www.kia.de/ "www.kia.de"))  
and if it is a exclusive corporate font, who designed it?

thanks for your help!

cheers!  
-daniel-
author: d.perraudin

comments.content: yeah, thanks.. seems to be neo sans!
